fields.name: chromStart
fields.description: Start position of the variant in chromosome, 0-based inclusive

fields.name: chromEnd
fields.description: End position of the variant in chromosome, 0-based exclusive

fields.name: score
fields.description: Indicates how dark the peak will be displayed in the browser (0-1000)

fields.name: strand
fields.description: Strand of the variant: '+' or '-' for the strand the variant was tested in, '.' for unknown

fields.name: log2FoldChange
fields.description: Fold change (alt output/input ratio divided by ref output/input ratio, in log2 space)

fields.name: inputCountRef
fields.description: Input count reference allele, normalized (CPM), mean across replicates

fields.name: outputCountRef
fields.description: Output count reference allele, normalized (CPM), mean across replicates

fields.name: inputCountAlt
fields.description: Input count alternative allele, normalized (CPM), mean across replicates

fields.name: outputCountAlt
fields.description: Output count alternative allele, normalized (CPM), mean across replicates

fields.name: postProbEffect
fields.description: Posterior probability of a regulatory effect

fields.name: CI_lower_95
fields.description: Lower bound of a 95% interval for the variant effect

fields.name: CI_upper_95
fields.description: Upper bound of a 95% interval for the variant effect

fields.name: variantPos
fields.description: 0-based position of the start of the variant in the tested sequence, -1 if aggregated effect over multiple positions

fields.name: refAllele
fields.description: Normalized Canonical SPDI reference variant sequence, allowed chars [A,T,G,C]

fields.name: altAllele
fields.description: Normalized Canonical SPDI alternative variant sequence, allowed chars [A,T,G,C]
